title: ⭐ Amusement Club ⭐ Card Game
description:
Amusement Club is a global gacha game for Discord with thousands of cute and fancy cards made by the bot's community. You can get started on any server by typing `->claim` in a bot channel. You will get your first card and special card of the day if you are new player. Each claim will cost you more tomatoes (in-game currency) `->daily` will reset your claim cost and give you extra tomatoes. Collect more cards and get a hero to unlock full game potential!

If you need help with setting up bot channel or setting custom prefix on your server, use `->help server`

fields.title: Commands
fields.description:
->help claim
->help summon
->help daily
->help balance
->help cards
->help sell
->help fav
->help diff
->help quests
->help query

fields.title: Invite bot
fields.description: Please run `->help invite` and read the conditions. Use `->help server` to get information about server related commands

title: About card craft/forge
description: This command allows you to get new cards using cards that you have. Forge will consume old cards. There are two types of forge, however: *Ordinary cards forge* and *Craft cards forge*

fields.title: Ordinary cards forge
fields.description: Can be used to forge simple non-craft cards. You can convert two 1-star cards into 2-star card, four 1-star cards (or two 2-star cards) into 3-star card. New card is completely random, except that if cards that you use for forging are from the same collection (fandom). In this case new card will be also from same collection. Ordinary forge costs 120 Tomatoes for 1-star cards and 240 Tomatoes for 2-star.

fields.title: Craft cards forge
fields.description: Used when all cards in arguments are craft cards. You have to combine certain cards in order to get a special **effect card**, that will be added to your inventory. This special card provides valuable effect. If you get a special *craft card*, try using part of it name to find info (e.g. `->forge info tohru`).

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can’t combine ordinary and craft card
You can’t combine cards of different level
Minimum amount of cards is 2
Craft cards usually contain part of effect card name

title: Effect card list
description:
**lvl 15** 6000 :tomato: 
**Cherry Blossoms** | Any card forge is 50% cheaper
```Censored Akari, Cherry Attacks```
**lvl 20** 4000 :tomato:
**Blue Free Eyes** | +200 :tomato: in ->daily
```Blue Eyes, Free Butterfly```
**lvl 20** 6200 :tomato: 
**Long-awaited Date** | Completes __first quest__ when used
```Date With Ayano, Kyoko Delight```
**lvl 25** 3700 :tomato: 
**Sushi Squad** | Get 20% more :tomato: when selling a card to bot
```Rolled Sushi Band, Rolled Sushi Party```
**lvl 30** 2300 :tomato:
**Delightful Sunset** | Reduces claim cost by 200 :tomato: when used
24 hour cooldown | Claim cost > 250 required
```Cheery Sunset, Afterschool Sunset```
**lvl 40** 10000 :tomato:
**Skies Of Friendship** |  Get 10% tomatoes back from wins on auction
```Clear Skies, Dragon Friend```
**lvl 40** 8900 :tomato:
**The Space Unity** |  Gives a random card from a __specified collection__ when used
20 hour cooldown
```Deep Space, Dragon Unity```
**lvl 45** 6200 :tomato:
**Gift From Tohru** | Get :star::star::star: card every first claim per day
```Gift to Koboyashi, Tohru’s Delight```
**lvl 50** 8800 :tomato:
**Onward To Victory** | Get 50% more hero experience
```Onward to Battle, Sword of Victory```
**lvl 55** 16000 :tomato:
**Hazardous Duo** |  Shows list of users that have __specified card__
2 hour cooldown
```Diffident Snake, Sneaky Phoenix```
**lvl 62** 18000 :tomato:
**The Ruler Jeanne** | Get ->daily in 15 hours instead of 20
```Dark Jeanne, Light Jeanne```
**lvl 80** 20000 :tomato:
**The Judgment Day** | Eliminates Humanity. Grants effect of any useable card
40 hour cooldown
```Triggered Angel, Huge Kaboom, Trumpet of Doom```

title: About inventory
description: Inventory contains different items that can be used in game. For example, effect cards. Items can be stored unlimited amount of time. Some items provide effect if they are in user’s inventory, some of them should be used.

fields.title: See the list of your items

title: About leaderboards
description: Provides a list of players, who have most stars (from cards) Globally or Locally. Card duplicates are not counted.

title: About hero
description:
Hero is a character with certain set of abilities that help you in the game. You can get hero for free after you get more than 50 ⭐. You can get your amount of stars by running `->bal`.
Hero change costs 2500 🍅 Tomatoes and can be done only once a week.
Hero gets XP if you are active. Hero level unlocks certain effect cards

title: About bot statistics
description: Provides information about server/players/cards

title: About card claiming
description: You can claim cards as long as you have enough 🍅 Tomatoes. Claim costs start at 50 tomatoes and increase by 50 each claim. The claim cost goes back to minimum after running `->daily`.

fields.title: Locked claims
fields.description: If the server you are claiming on is related to specific fandom/series, that means that only one collection is used for claiming. However, you can always try and claim among all available cards for the bot. Use `->claim any` for that

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
This command can be executed only in bot channel (`->help channel` for more info)
Claim cost can be different for certain *heroes*
Some *effect cards* can reduce claim cost
The message above card shows cost of your next claim and can also include important information about the card

fields.title: Get a random card (can be locked)

title: About card summon
description:
You can summon card in any channel on server, but only if you have this card. This operation won't consume card.
You can include partial name of the card, but it has to be more than 3 characters long. The system will try to find *most suitable card* using name you provided

title: About daily bonus
description: You can get free **300🍅** Tomatoes every 20 hours. This command will also reset your `->claim` cost and give **2 quests** if you have a hero

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
New players get 1000🍅 bonus
The daily bonus can be different for certain heroes
*Effect cards* can also change daily bonus

title: About card pricing
description: Bot evaluates card value depending on amount of stars, type and amount users that already have it. This is really useful to know the market price of item when trading it.

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can use any filters for card search, except `-multi`
Bot uses those values to determine your **give/get ratio** (read more in `->help trade`)

title: About currencies
description:
This command will show your amount of 🍅 Tomatoes and ⭐ Stars.
**Tomatoes** is a main currency in game, that is used for card `->claim`, trading, forging, etc. You can get them by completing `->quests` and claiming `->daily`
**Stars** show you overall (clean) sum of card stars that you have. This is used mostly for rating and some benefits, like *heroes*
Daily bonus gives Bananas depending on hero level

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description: You can also spend your tomatoes by accepting trade requests from other users (`->help sell`) and selling cards on auction (`->help auc`)

title: About __card__ sending
description:
Direct card sending has been removed since `1.10`
Please consider using `->sell` for card exchange

title: About trading rules
description: **Since v1.9.12** trading was replaced with selling and auctions. Please use `->help sell` and `->help auction` to learn more

title: About __tomato__ sending
description: This functionality is not available. Please read `->help sell` for more information

title: About card listing
description: Gets your cards and shows it in several pages. If you have a long card list, use *card filters* to show only cards that you are interested in. See the filters below or read more at `->help query`

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can combine any filters in any order. If no cards found, bot will tell you that
To see all collections, run `->stats cards`

fields.title: Show only cards from some collection
Show only cards with certain amount of stars
Show cards that has keyword in the name

title: About cards selling
description: **Since 1.10** direct tomato and card sending was replaced with selling. Users can sell cards either to bot or to other users. In both cases prices are defined by bot.

fields.title: Sell a card to BOT
fields.description:
Use `->sell [card query]` to sell cards that you don't need. You get:
300🍅 for 3🌟 card, 150🍅 for 2🌟 and 80🍅 for 1🌟
Note that selling to bot doesn't mean selling for eval price.

fields.title: Sell a card to USER
fields.description: Use `->sell @user [card query]` to sell a card to user. Target user will be asked to confirm or decline your transaction. You can **not** send more than 1 request to the same user. Selling price is decided by bot using **eval algorithm**. You can always run `->eval [card query]` to find out card cost before trading it

fields.title: Getting into Debt
fields.description: If someone sells you a card for more tomatoes than you own, you will find yourself in **debt**. You will need to come out of debt before you can trade with others. You **can** however, daily and sell cards to come out of debt.

title: Adding cards to favorites
description: You can add any card to favorites. That kind of card can't be sent and it won't show up for other users in `->has` or `->diff` commands, unless you have 2 or more of those cards or add the `-fav` option

fields.title: Remove many from favorites
fields.description:
->fav remove all [card query]
or
->unfav all [card query]

title: Card query
description:
In the help messages you will often see `[card query]`. But what does it mean?
 In Amusement Club you can get cards in any request type (except `forge`) by using different card parameters. Those parameters can be also combined

fields.title: Sort by time when card was accuired

title: About difference
description: Difference is very useful command for trading, that will show you cards that certain user has and you not. It can accept same set of filters as `->cards` command.  Add option `-fav` to include favorite cards.

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can combine any filters in any order.
To see all collections, run `->stats cards`

fields.title: Show only cards from some collection
Show only cards with certain amount of stars
Show cards that has keyword in the name

title: About quests
description: Quests are small daily tasks that players get after running `->daily` command. Usually you will get 2 different quests (that might be different depending on your hero). Users starts getting quests only after they get a hero

title: Learn if user has a card
description: This little useful command will try to find if user has certain card by name. It is useful, when you need to transfer card and would like to make sure target user doesn't have it already. Add option `-fav` to include favorite cards.

title: About updates
description: This command provides list of latest updates for the bot. This is always useful to check for latest changes to not make mistakes and lose tomatoes! For more details and update notifications, join [Bot Discord](https://discord.gg/kqgAvdX)

title: About bot channels
description: Amusement Club is a discord bot that can read commands from any channel. However, there are some limitations

fields.title: Direct messages
fields.description: You can do most of the commands excapt `->claim`

title: About store
description:
Command is not available.
This function will be available after v2018.0

title: About auctions
description: Auctions are a way to trade your cards introduced in `v1.10`. You can put any card on auction for a fee equal to 10% of your listing price, and then other users can bid on it. Each card will be on the auction list for 5 hours and sold to the highest bidder. If nobody bids on your card, your card will return to you, but the listing fee will not be refunded.

fields.title: IMPORTANT
fields.description: Please note that using alt accounts to manipulate auctions in any way may result temporary or even **permanent ban**

fields.title: Searching for cards/collection
fields.description: Use `->auc` or `->auc [card title]` or `->auc [-card collection]` to find the list of current auctions.

fields.title: Selling a card
fields.description: Command:`->auc sell [card title], [amount]` will list your card on auction. Instead of an amount, you may enter a percent of eval in decimal form (e.g. "0.5" or "2.5" etc). The lowest possible price is 0.5x eval, while the highest is 4.0x eval. If no amount is given, the eval price is used.

fields.title: Bidding on a card
fields.description:
Command: `->auc bid [id] [amount]` For example `->auc bid ktgs4 500` will bid 500 🍅 on auction with ID `ktgs4`. You can not bid on your own auction. If no amount is given, the minimum bid amount will be used.
**IMPORTANT**: Place your bids carefully! Your tomatoes will be taken automatically when you place a bid. It will be returned to you when you have been outbid.

fields.title: Finding information on a bid
fields.description: Command:`->auc info [id]` will show you detailed information about that auction auction.

fields.title: Tracking my auctions
fields.description: Command: `->auc -me` This command will show you the auctions you have created.

fields.title: Tracking my bids
fields.description: Command: `->auc -bid` This command will show you the auctions you have bid in.

fields.title: Diamond marks
fields.description:
Auctions in the list has diamond marks on them:
🔹 means that you created that auction
🔸 means that your bid is leading in this auction
▪️ means you can bid on this auction.

fields.title: Unknown prices
fields.description: Sometimes bids will show up as **???**. That means that bid was done by player that has a hero with a bid hiding effect. You will have to guess how to outbid them.

title: About transaction history
description:
You can review your transaction history; this includes sells and auctions. Transactions older than a week will be erased.
If transaction was done via auction, you can also get auction details using TransactionID `->auc info [transaction_id]`

fields.title: ->gets
fields.description: List of the transactions where you got a card

fields.title: ->sends
fields.description: List of the transactions where you sent a card

fields.title: ->pending
fields.description: List of the transactions that are waiting for confirmations

fields.title: ->info [id]
fields.description: Gets detailed info about transaction using TransactionID

title: About collections
description:
Collections or 'fandoms' are sets of cards that have same template and somehow belong to the same origin. Collections can be used for card filtering like [-collectionname]. Collections have name aliases that can be used for search.
You can see the list of all collections or information about certain one using `->col` command

title: About tagging
description:
Command is not available.
This function will be available after v2018.0

title: About bot invitation
description: You can add Amusement Club on any other server. Type `->invite` to get an invite link with all permissions set up.

fields.title: Setting up your server
fields.description:
Make sure that your server has 'bot channel' where Amusement Club can post messages.
`->server info` will show you the list of bot channels. You can set channel to bot by messaging `->server setbot` in that channel. `->server unsetbot` will remove bot perms from current channel.
Don't remove 'send messages' permission from channels where you want `->summon` to work.
If you want to exclude Amusement Club from other bot channel, make sure you remove **both** 'read' and 'send' permissions. If you leave 'read messages' permission on, bot will still read commands, but won't be able to respond which can lead to confusion and lost of tomatoes

fields.title: Channel Privacy (28.05.18)
fields.description:
Bot constantly reads all the messages, however it logs only messages that start with `->`. Feel free to exclude bot from ANY channels, that you want to secure contents of.
**Messages in Logs** can be used by **bot administration** to find bugs/errors and cheaters. In order to secure your channels completely from any bot, make sure that it is **not** present in channels, that may contain any **confidential** information

fields.title: Server administration
fields.description: **Please note**, that bot can be invited only by users, that have permission to invite bots to server. If you are NOT target server administrator, send *generated link* to administrator or any person with corresponding role

fields.title: Any questions?
fields.description: If you have any questions regarding bot, please ask them [in bot discord](https://discord.gg/kqgAvdX)

fields.title: Ready to invite?
fields.description: Please, run `->invite` to get a link.

title: Bot customization
description: You can set custom prefix/bot channels for Amusement Club. Following commands can be accessed by server owner only

fields.title: ->guild info
fields.description: Shows basic information about current server

fields.title: ->guild setbot
fields.description: Sets current channel for bot usage. `->guild unsetbot` will give opposite effect

fields.title: ->guild setprefix
fields.description: Changes prefix of bot on current server

fields.title: Any questions?
fields.description: If you have any questions regarding bot, please ask them [in bot discord](https://discord.gg/kqgAvdX)

title: Card Ratings
description: Players can rate their cards and view those ratings or even sort by them. Players' ratings are averaged into a global average rating that can be seen with ->info [card]

fields.title: ->rate [rating] [card]
fields.description: Rate one of your cards from 1 to 10.

title: Claim Boosts
description: Claim Boosts are temporary card drop rate boosts for certain set of cards. You can claim cards from the set with increased probability by using command indicated in your `->daily`

title: Boosts (admin mode)
description: Boost commands:

fields.title: ->boost add [id] [chance] [start] [end]
fields.description:
Creates a new boost. 'id': doubles as a name but cannot have spaces.
'chance': is a decimal number between 0 and 1.
'start' and 'end': are dates with format DD/MM/YYYY

fields.title: ->boost list all
fields.description: Shows all boosts in the system (past, present, and future).

fields.title: ->boost info [boost_id]
fields.description: Shows all info for the specified boost.

fields.title: ->boost addcards [boost_id] [card_query]
fields.description:
Adds cards to the specified boost.
If an added card was in a different boost, it will be removed from there.

fields.title: ->boost removecards [boost_id] [card_query]
fields.description: Removes cards from the specified boost.

fields.title: ->boost listcards [boost_id]
fields.description: Shows a list of all cards included in the specified boost.
